mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction( tran_no , prod_no , buyer_id , payment_option , receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request , tran_status_code, order_data , dlvy_date) VALUES ( seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval , #{purchaseProd.prodNo:VARCHAR} , #{buyer.userId:VARCHAR} , #{paymentOption} , #{receiverName} , #{receiverPhone} , #{divyAddr} , #{divyRequest} , '001' , SYSDATE , #{divyDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT t.tran_no, t.payment_option, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.demailaddr, t.dlvy_request, t.tran_status_code, t.order_data, t.dlvy_date, t.prod_no, t.buyer_id FROM transaction t, product p,users u WHERE t.prod_no = p.prod_no and t.buyer_id = u.user_id and t.tran_no = #{value}
SELECT t.tran_no,t.tran_status_code FROM transaction t, product p WHERE t.prod_no = p.prod_no and p.prod_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM(SELECT inner_table.*,ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM (SELECT t.tran_no, t.payment_option, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.demailaddr, t.dlvy_request, t.tran_status_code, t.order_data, t.dlvy_date, t.prod_no, t.buyer_id FROM transaction t,product p,users u where t.prod_no = p.prod_no and t.buyer_id = u.user_id and t.buyer_id = #{buyerId} ORDER BY t.prod_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
